name: Get the Recipe
description: Remove the fluff from long winded recipes. Extract written instructions from Youtube recipes WIP. Also handles serving size and unit conversion, saving and note taking on recipes.

name: Arema
description: Schedules, jobs, and payments all in one chat.

name: Marfafa
description: The easiest way to design, create and send custom products to your customers, securely and privately. Provide clients with branded gifts worldwide without needing their address, anytime you choose.

name: Everywork
description: A generic freelancer application. The stack was used as the inspiration for later projects.

name: Security Compass
description: Built with NextJS, TypeScript and SASS using Apollo Client in the frontend and implementing Incremental Static Regeneration building feature of NextJS. The backend is built with a Headless WP using a WPGraphQL plugin.
